We Are Oils Network

A doTERRA® Wellness Advocate

We are Mark Ewen & Christian Overton. Our goal is to help as many people as possible to achieve their goals. That is why we joined forces to create Oils Network. We are doTERRA wellness advocates and whether you want to join our team of wellness advocates or try the doTERRA products, we are here to help.

Become a Wellness Advocate

Sign up for just $35. Renew annually for only $25 and get a free bottle of peppermint!

  • Get a Personal Website
  • Access Tools and Support
  • Earn commission on sales

Become a Wellness Advocate

Some of Our Team Members

Here are a few testimonials from among thousands of our successful team members.

How to Join dōTERRA®

There are two different membership types depending on your personal goals. You can become a wholesale customer or you can become a wellness advocate. You can join doTERRA in 3 simple steps: create an account, choose your kit, build your business:

1. Sign Up

Click the button below to get started. You will be prompted to enter your basic information and create an account.

2. Choose Your Kit

Then you will choose the products and the type of membership you want. You can start as low as $35.

3. Enjoy & Share the Products

Finally, your account will be set. You can order products at wholesale price and experience the benefits of being part of the doTERRA family.

Join doTERRA NOW

You can start as low as $35. Join Now.

Become a Wholesale Customer

Here are some benefits of becoming a customer:

  • Order product at 25 percent wholesale discount
  • Buy directly from doterra.com
  • Participate in the Loyalty Rewards Program

  • Free product upon membership renewal

Get 25% OFF Wholesale

Deal of The Month:
Behind Balsam Fir Essential Oil

Don’t miss out on the exciting deals and promotions doTERRA has every month! Stay in the know about fun new products, creative diffuser blend ideas, and more. When you take advantage of doTERRA’s monthly deals, you can get FREE products and discounts, and save money on your favorite essential oils.

See details below

Join doTERRA NOW

Join doTERRA NOW

Free E-book: 100 Uses For
Essential Oils

Free E-book: 100 Uses For
Essential Oils

Want to know all the ways you can use essential oils? This e-book will help you know how to get the most out of your oils. You can get it for free by filling out the form below.

Frequently Asked Questions

Where do I start?

First, you will need to determine if you would like to be a Wellness Advocate or a Wholesale Customer. You will find the corresponding button on the top of this page. Click the button of your choice to learn more.

How much does it cost to join?

The cost for just an annual dōTERRA membership is $35. If you start with an enrollment kit, that waives the membership fee and includes the most popular essential oil products. Enrollment kits start at $150.

Why should I join through Oils Network?

You will get support and amazing team members. Join our over 350,000 members! Join a team where your upline cares about you.

Do I need to get a kit to sign up?

You do not need to purchase a kit to join doTERRA. For $35 you will become a member for a whole year.

As a wholesale customer, do I need to sell oils?

As a customer you will not be expected to sell oils. That is 100% optional. 

What is the loyalty rewards program?

The loyalty rewards program, also called LRP, allows members who order monthly to earn free product points. These can be used for cash purchases.

How do I get commissions?

doTERRA is structured with unilevel enrollment. Unlike other compensation plans, doTERRA increase the percentage at the lower levels. This allows for greater payout potential. There are weekly payouts, monthly payouts, as well as bonuses.

As a wholesale member, do I have to buy products every month?

No. A wholesale member does not need to purchase every month. You can purchase whenever you want. 

Ready to Join dōTERRA® & The Oils Network Team

This is your chance to jump into this amazing opportunity and start a journey of health and wellness. Our team Oils Network is here to help you. We have approximately 380,000 happy members and now you can join us too. You’ll get the support and leadership from an amazing upline. Click the button below to get started!

Join doTERRA NOW
